common.title: Open Corridor
common.description: Search over 20,000 tables extracted from 37 pipeline applications and their Environmental and Socio-Econonmic Assesments - the start of something new, at the Canada Energy Regulator.

accuracyAlert.title: A NOTE ON ACCURACY
accuracyAlert.body: Results may be limited. Some data has been excluded.

dropdown.tooltip: This dataset is limited to projects falling under the former {nebAct}. The current {cerAct} has amended and added new categories of projects.

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.body: CSV table data is extracted according to the methods outlined in the Methodology Documentation and may contain some inaccuracies. Extracted data is limited to the data contained in the ESA that is filed for the first time in a specific Application to which that ESA applies. ESA-related information that is filed after that initial Application-specific ESA is filed is excluded from this collection. In the event of variance, the original PDF in REGDOCS is the main source. Data sources for ESA tables are cited at the discretion of those writing the ESAs and may vary according to ESA.

termsTitle.title: Terms and Conditions
termsTitle.body: Please refer to the CER website's {link} for limitations, which apply to this repository.

citation.title: Citation
citation.body: To cite this data bank, please use the following {cite} To cite individual data tables, please also cite the original ESA PDF in REGDOCS.
citation.cite: Canada Energy Regulator (2020): Environmental and Socio-Economic Assessment Data Bank.

dataSection.zipText: You are about to download a ZIP package including the below:
dataSection.countsPart2: packaged in their respective Application folders, and including an index of tables
dataSection.limitationsText: By downloading these files, you understand the above limitations and agree to adhere to all requirements.

treeMap.title: Select a box to filter by project and access project details.

This visualization has been designed for use on computers and tablets with a screen width of at least 768 pixels.

alert.title: BETA
alert.body: This site will change as we test ideas.

disclaimer.body: Environmental and Socio-Economic Assessments cover many categories of “components” for assessment - including rare species, wetlands, and human health.

accreditations.title: Accreditations
accreditations.body: From the Noun Project: aid by Scribble.liners; help by hafiudin; Risks by Ralf Schmitzer; Image by Flatart

wetlands.title: Unnamed Wetlands
wetlands.body: Areas of land that may have never before been documented.

nests.title: Raptor nests
nests.body: Bird nests that fall along a pipeline corridor.

fish.title: Ditch fish
fish.body: A fish species documented in a tributary off the Fraser River.

project.title: The project
project.description: The opportunity of a legacy, driven by policy - and our plans for the future.

data.description: An introduction to Environmental and Socio-Economic Assessments ("ESA's")
